text: Ia wainɨn dɨpabar ofaba bagh, wainɨn dɨpar litan pumuning inigh, vaghvagh bulmakaun apurir kam ko ofa damu. Ia wainɨn dɨpar litan vamɨra ko natam inigh sipsipɨn apurim ko ofa damu. Ia wainɨn dɨpar litan vamɨra inigh sipsipɨn nguzir vamɨra sara ofa damu. Ia kamaghɨra 7plan sipsipɨn nguzir kaba vaghvagh dar ofa damu. Ia zurara ofan bar isia mɨghɨriba, azenibar iakɨnibar aruer faraghɨvɨra zuibar, ia kamaghɨra, ofabar amu.
